assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Create UX/UI strategy for SSELFIE Studio landing page focusing on:
1. Hero section layout and messaging
2. Feature showcase structure
3. Pricing section design
4. Call-to-action placement
5. User flow optimization
Include wireframe recommendations and conversion optimization elements.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Developing main landing page for SSELFIE Studio launch. Need to effectively communicate all-in-one personal branding platform value proposition and drive conversions for both Creator (€27/month) and Entrepreneur (€67/month) tiers.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Develop visual branding strategy for SSELFIE Studio landing page including:
1. Color palette recommendations
2. Typography selection
3. Key visual elements and imagery style
4. Brand consistency guidelines
5. Visual hierarchy for content sections
Focus on professional, modern aesthetic that appeals to both creators and entrepreneurs.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Creating cohesive visual identity for SSELFIE Studio landing page that reflects premium all-in-one personal branding platform positioning.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Create comprehensive copywriting strategy for SSELFIE Studio landing page including:
1. Value proposition and main headline options
2. Feature benefit statements
3. Pricing tier messaging
4. Call-to-action copy variations
5. SEO-optimized content structure
Focus on compelling messaging that highlights the platform's all-in-one value proposition and cost savings compared to multiple subscriptions.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Developing persuasive copy for SSELFIE Studio landing page that emphasizes the platform's unique value in replacing multiple expensive subscriptions (€120-180+/month) with one affordable solution (€27/month Creator, €67/month Entrepreneur plans).

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Create compelling landing page copy for SSELFIE Studio focusing on:

1. Main headline that captures the all-in-one personal branding platform value
2. Sub-headlines for each key feature (TRAIN, STYLE, SHOOT, BUILD, MANAGE)
3. Value propositions highlighting:
   - Cost savings vs €120-180 monthly subscriptions
   - Time savings from integrated workflow
   - Professional results for creators
4. Clear pricing tier benefits for:
   - Creator tier (€27/month)
   - Entrepreneur tier (€67/month)
5. Call-to-action copy that drives sign-ups

Key messaging points to incorporate:
- Replace multiple expensive subscriptions with one solution
- AI-powered personal branding made simple
- Professional results without the professional price tag
- From photoshoot to website - everything in one place
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Developing main landing page copy to drive SSELFIE Studio launch. Copy needs to clearly communicate the platform's value proposition and drive conversions. This is a critical component of our launch strategy.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Audit current website building capabilities and provide status report on:

1. Which website building features are fully implemented
2. Current limitations or restrictions
3. Key differentiators from competitors
4. Technical capabilities we can highlight in marketing
5. Recommended feature emphasis for launch messaging
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Developing landing page strategy and need to ensure our messaging aligns with actual technical capabilities. This will inform our copywriting and value proposition statements.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Create compelling headlines and value proposition copy for SSELFIE Studio's landing page. Focus on:
1. Main headline that captures the all-in-one personal branding platform value
2. Sub-headlines highlighting key benefits and TRAIN→STYLE→SHOOT→BUILD→MANAGE journey
3. Value proposition statements that emphasize replacing multiple €120-180+ subscriptions with one solution
4. Clear differentiation between Creator (€27/mo) and Entrepreneur (€67/mo) tiers
5. Pain points addressed (time savings, cost savings, simplified workflow)
assignedTasks.workflowContext: We're preparing for immediate market launch of SSELFIE Studio. The copy needs to clearly communicate our value as an all-in-one personal branding platform while highlighting the cost savings compared to using multiple tools. This is critical for initial user acquisition and positioning.
expectedDeliverables: Sub-headlines for each key feature/journey step

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Create high-converting headlines and value propositions for SSELFIE Studio's landing page that:
1. Emphasize the all-in-one personal branding solution (replacing €120-180+ worth of monthly subscriptions)
2. Highlight the 5-step journey: TRAIN → STYLE → SHOOT → BUILD → MANAGE
3. Focus on creator pain points around managing multiple expensive tools
4. Include primary headline options, subheadlines, and 3-5 core value propositions
5. Incorporate pricing value messaging (€27 Creator / €67 Entrepreneur tiers)
assignedTasks.workflowContext: We're preparing for SSELFIE Studio's market launch, focusing on positioning as an integrated personal branding platform. The copy needs to clearly communicate the value proposition and differentiate from individual point solutions like Canva, ChatGPT, etc.
expectedDeliverables: Subheadline options that support main value proposition
3-5 core value propositions written in compelling language
Price comparison messaging highlighting savings vs. multiple subscriptions

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Create visual style recommendations for SSELFIE Studio's landing page that will:
1. Support and enhance the upcoming copy from Victoria
2. Visualize the 5-step journey (TRAIN → STYLE → SHOOT → BUILD → MANAGE)
3. Create compelling visual hierarchy for pricing tiers
4. Design mockups for key value proposition sections
5. Ensure brand consistency across all elements
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Working in parallel with Victoria who is developing the copy. We need a cohesive visual language that emphasizes SSELFIE Studio as a premium, all-in-one personal branding platform while maintaining accessibility and appeal to creators.

assignedTasks.taskDescription: Create visual brand style guide for Sandra's personal brand that aligns with SSELFIE STUDIO aesthetic. Focus on colors, typography, and visual elements that tell the "single mom to tech founder" story.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Building foundational brand assets for Sandra's personal brand scaling strategy

assignedTasks.taskDescription: Develop high-converting landing page template for Sandra's personal brand that highlights her journey from single mom to tech founder, with focus on SSELFIE STUDIO as her flagship product.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Creating conversion-focused web presence for Sandra's brand scaling

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Create a cohesive social media branding strategy for SSELFIE Studio launch, focusing on:
1. Visual identity guidelines for social media
2. Content pillars that highlight the 5-step journey (TRAIN→STYLE→SHOOT→BUILD→MANAGE)
3. Brand voice and messaging that emphasizes the all-in-one solution replacing multiple subscriptions
4. Strategic positioning against €120-180 competitor costs
assignedTasks.workflowContext: This is part of the SSELFIE Studio launch strategy, targeting existing followers and new potential customers. We need to position SSELFIE Studio as the comprehensive personal branding solution at an attractive price point.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Develop a community growth and engagement strategy for SSELFIE Studio:
1. Plan for converting Sandra's existing 135K+ followers into platform users
2. Community engagement tactics for both Creator (€27/mo) and Entrepreneur (€67/mo) tiers
3. Social proof and testimonial collection system
4. Community-driven content creation framework
5. Engagement metrics and KPIs
assignedTasks.workflowContext: We're launching SSELFIE Studio and need to leverage Sandra's existing audience while building a strong community around the platform. Focus on creating value and engagement that drives platform adoption.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Create compelling sales page copywriting including:
1. Main headline and sub-headlines that highlight SSELFIE Studio as the all-in-one personal branding platform
2. Clear value propositions emphasizing how we replace €120-180+ monthly subscriptions (Canva, ChatGPT, photo editors) with one affordable solution
3. Benefit-focused copy for both pricing tiers:
   - Creator (€27/month)
   - Entrepreneur (€67/month)
4. Compelling descriptions of our 5-step journey:
   - TRAIN (AI model)
   - STYLE (personalized branding)
   - SHOOT (photo prompts)
   - BUILD (website creation)
   - MANAGE (ongoing content)
5. Call-to-action copy that drives conversions

Focus on pain points: high costs of multiple subscriptions, time waste switching between tools, complexity of personal branding.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: We need conversion-focused sales copy that positions SSELFIE Studio as the comprehensive yet affordable solution for personal branding. The copy should emphasize our unique value proposition of replacing expensive tool subscriptions with one platform. This is for immediate launch marketing materials.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Create compelling headlines and value propositions for SSELFIE Studio's sales page focusing on:

1. Main headline that captures the all-in-one personal branding platform value
2. Sub-headlines highlighting key benefits of replacing multiple subscriptions (Canva, ChatGPT, photo editors) with one solution
3. Value propositions for both pricing tiers:
   - Creator (€27/month)
   - Entrepreneur (€67/month)
4. Clear benefit statements around the TRAIN → STYLE → SHOOT → BUILD → MANAGE journey

Key messaging points to incorporate:
- Cost savings vs €120-180+ monthly subscriptions
- All-in-one platform simplification
- Personal branding acceleration
- AI-powered transformation
assignedTasks.workflowContext: We're preparing for SSELFIE Studio's market launch and need compelling sales copy that clearly communicates our value proposition and pricing tiers. This copy will be central to our sales page and conversion strategy.
expectedDeliverables: Benefit statements for each step of the user journey

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Create compelling homepage headlines for SSELFIE Studio that:
1. Emphasize the all-in-one personal branding platform value proposition
2. Highlight the cost-saving benefit (replacing €120-180+ monthly subscriptions)
3. Incorporate the TRAIN → STYLE → SHOOT → BUILD → MANAGE journey
4. Appeal to creators and entrepreneurs
5. Focus on immediate value delivery for launch

Key points to incorporate:
- Primary value: All-in-one personal branding solution
- Cost benefit: Replace multiple expensive subscriptions
- Target audience: Creators (€27/mo) and Entrepreneurs (€67/mo)
- Unique selling point: Complete personal branding journey with AI assistance
assignedTasks.workflowContext: We're preparing for the immediate launch of SSELFIE Studio. These headlines will be crucial for the homepage to clearly communicate our value proposition and convert visitors. The copy needs to be launch-ready and focused on what we can deliver now.

Prepare the homepage structure to receive new headlines:

assignedTasks.taskDescription: Rewrite all pre-login page copy focusing on personal branding transformation. Use Sandra's story as the core narrative. Emphasize the power of having your own AI model trained on your unique brand.

Focus on communicating the value of the website building capabilities within SSELFIE Studio.

Pay special attention to critical paths and potential friction points.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Design and implement an automated task execution workflow that:
1. Periodically checks for assigned tasks across all agents
2. Automatically triggers agent activation when tasks are assigned
3. Implements task prioritization based on urgency/dependencies
4. Sets up automated handoffs between agents
5. Creates a monitoring system for task progress
assignedTasks.workflowContext: We need to improve the efficiency of our multi-agent system by ensuring tasks are automatically picked up and executed. This will streamline our operations for Sandra's SSELFIE STUDIO launch.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Implement the technical backend for automated task execution:
1. Create an API endpoint for task status monitoring
2. Implement a task queue system with priority handling
3. Set up automated agent activation triggers
4. Create a task dependency resolution system
5. Implement real-time task status updates
assignedTasks.workflowContext: This is part of our automated task execution system implementation. The backend needs to support Wilma's workflow automation and enable seamless agent activation.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Set up monitoring and organization system for automated tasks:
1. Create a structured task repository
2. Implement logging and monitoring
3. Set up task execution metrics
4. Create agent performance dashboards
5. Implement automatic task archiving
assignedTasks.workflowContext: This complements the automated task execution system by providing visibility and organization to all automated processes.

7. Auth error handling UI

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Implement secure authentication system with following requirements:

1. Password Hashing:
- Use Argon2id for password hashing
- Minimum salt length: 16 bytes
- Memory cost: 64MB
- Iterations: minimum 3
- Parallelism factor: 4

2. Token Management:
- JWT tokens with RS256 algorithm
- Access tokens: 15 min expiry
- Refresh tokens: 7 day expiry
- Implement token rotation
- Store refresh tokens in secure HTTP-only cookies

3. Security Middleware:
- Rate limiting (max 100 requests per 15 min window)
- CORS configuration
- XSS protection headers
- CSRF protection
- Request sanitization

4. Input Validation:
- Password requirements: min 12 chars, 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase, 1 number, 1 special char
- Email validation with proper regex
- Username requirements: 3-30 chars, alphanumeric + underscore
- Input sanitization for all user data
- Request body size limits
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Building secure authentication system for SSELFIE Studio platform. This is a critical security component that needs to be properly implemented before launch.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Security testing plan for authentication system:

1. Password Security Testing:
- Test password hashing implementation
- Verify salt uniqueness
- Test password validation rules
- Check against common password lists
- Verify hashing parameters (memory, iterations, parallelism)

2. Token Security Testing:
- Verify JWT signature validation
- Test token expiration handling
- Check refresh token rotation
- Test cookie security settings
- Verify token revocation

3. Security Middleware Testing:
- Test rate limiting functionality
- Verify CORS policy
- Test XSS protection
- CSRF token validation
- Input sanitization verification

4. Penetration Testing:
- Brute force protection
- SQL injection testing
- XSS vulnerability scanning
- CSRF attack simulation
- Session fixation tests
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Need comprehensive security testing plan for new authentication system implementation. This ensures our security measures are properly implemented and effective.

assignedTasks.taskDescription: Conduct thorough QA testing of the three launch features: TRAIN, Maya chat, and SSELFIE gallery. Focus on user flow, error handling, and cross-feature integration. Test both Creator and Entrepreneur tier access points.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Preparing for immediate launch with simplified feature set. Need to ensure smooth user experience across all three core features.

assignedTasks.taskDescription: Create automated workflow for user onboarding focusing on our three core features (TRAIN, Maya chat, SSELFIE gallery). Design clear user pathways for both Creator and Entrepreneur tiers.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Immediate launch preparation - need streamlined onboarding process for new users.

assignedTasks.taskDescription: Develop social media launch strategy targeting Sandra's 135K+ followers. Create content plan showcasing TRAIN, Maya chat, and SSELFIE gallery features. Include special launch offers and tier benefits.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Preparing for immediate launch with simplified feature set. Need to maximize exposure to existing audience.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Implement responsive design for SSELFIE gallery and TRAIN module:
1. Create mobile-first responsive layouts
2. Implement breakpoint-based media queries for all screen sizes
3. Develop adaptive gallery grid system
4. Optimize TRAIN module interface for mobile/tablet/desktop

Technical Requirements:
- Use CSS Grid/Flexbox for responsive gallery
- Implement standard breakpoints (mobile: 320px, tablet: 768px, desktop: 1024px+)
- Ensure touch-friendly interfaces for mobile
- Optimize image loading for different viewport sizes
assignedTasks.workflowContext: High-priority UI enhancement for SSELFIE Studio platform. This work is critical for user experience and platform accessibility across devices.
expectedDeliverables: CSS implementation for all viewport sizes

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Implement comprehensive error handling for SSELFIE gallery and TRAIN module:
1. Add try/catch blocks around critical operations
2. Create user-friendly error messages and states
3. Implement error boundary components
4. Design error recovery flows

Technical Requirements:
- Implement React Error Boundaries
- Create standardized error message components
- Add error state management
- Implement graceful fallbacks
- Create error logging system
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Critical platform stability enhancement for SSELFIE Studio. This work ensures robust error handling and improved user experience during edge cases.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Analyze and report on frontend responsive design metrics:
1. Check viewport adaptability across breakpoints
2. Validate CSS media query performance
3. Monitor responsive image loading times
4. Test interactive element scaling
assignedTasks.workflowContext: System health monitoring task requires comprehensive frontend performance analysis

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Analyze backend error rates and system stability:
1. Review error logs and categorize issues
2. Check API endpoint response times
3. Monitor database query performance
4. Identify potential memory leaks
5. Generate error rate trends report
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Critical system health monitoring requires backend performance analysis

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Execute comprehensive QA testing:
1. Run automated test suites
2. Validate user flows
3. Check cross-browser compatibility
4. Test error handling
5. Generate QA coverage report
assignedTasks.workflowContext: System health monitoring requires thorough quality assurance validation

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Set up system health monitoring infrastructure:
1. Create error_logs table for tracking system errors
2. Implement performance metrics tables
3. Set up monitoring dashboards
4. Configure automated reporting
5. Document monitoring structure
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Need to establish proper system health monitoring infrastructure
